channel.title: TGRoss
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGRoss, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How the Market is “Churning”
item.description: Hey, Ross Givens here! The financial sector has been the top performer in the S&P 500 for months—outpacing tech by a staggering 20-to-1 margin. That’s...

item.title: Bullish Pattern Forming
item.description: Hey, Ross Givens here! The S&P 500 is forming a classic “bull wedge” pattern—one that could signal a major breakout. The same setup is unfolding in th...

item.title: The Effect of the “T-Word”
item.description: Hey, Ross Givens here! Tariffs are back in focus, and the market’s reaction this time around is even sharper than in 2018–2019. Investors fear inflati...

item.title: Fear is in the Air
item.description: Hey, Ross Givens here! Bearish sentiment among retail investors just hit its highest level since November 2023—yet the S&P 500 remains near all-time h...

item.title: Will We See a Market “Three-peat” This Week?
